name: Reach: Flower Growth
description:
Reach: Flower Growth is a small look into a flower growing and trying to get stopped by bees. It was the first time for me to look into procedural generation and random selection. The game has only 2 controls making it very easy to pick up and play. 

This game was made for the Great Spring jam with the mechanic of Constant Growth, which I used on the flower that keeps growing.  The theme was Spring, which is the reason the game is about a flower and bees in the springtime!

Controlling the Flower: A to move left, D to move right.
